CustomField.description: This field captures reschedule option on excess payment based on 'Reschedule Option On Excess Payment' field value on 'CL Contract' object at the time of excess payment with respect to excess threshold : Keep Same Payment Amount - Changes loan maturity date keeping same installment Change Payment Amount - Changes installment amount keeping same maturity date
